title: Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Review - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Go listen to A Better Paradise today, and don't forget to follow it on your platform of choice to make sure you never miss an episode!

Andy, Blessing, and Barrett give their reviews of the Elden Ring DLC.
